SheetData.Message: - NOTE: This sheet and userinfo.json will only work for client v3.03+ as of December 14, 2023. For v3.02 (EN/JP), use the sheet and userinfo.json in the "Pre-3.03" folder of the repo instead. - Add ability to sim "allies"/NPCs (e.g., SC+ Gustav support). - Add new mods: EVO 3Mod, Px4 StormMod, FalconMod, EM2Mod. - Add new SPEQs: EVO 3Mod, Px4 StormMod, FalconMod, EM2Mod, Liberator, L85A1, Z62, TMP. - Fix issue with doll/equipment dropdowns not showing all entries.
